content.rendered:
Comfortable complex with full infrastructure to enjoy the resort life near the Mediterranean Sea. Estimated rental yield of 17%

General Information:

Total area: 20000 m2

Number of houses: 3

Number of apartments: 724

HOLLYWOOD Oasis Home MMT is a new large-scale resort complex, located on the sea front in Morphou Bay in the Gaziveren area of North Cyprus. Indeed, has an ideal location, in a sparsely populated, ecologically impeccable place, which is one of the reasons why many people wishing to buy property in Cyprus, decided to buy it here. The complex is located right by the beautiful sandy beach, a short walk from the center of Gaziveren. Gaziveren is a picturesque town in the northern part of the island, where you can find many stores, cafes and restaurants. You can also buy everything you need for your daily needs in the nearby town of Lefke.

Our company has been implementing projects in resort and urban areas for 19 years and has a portfolio of more than 30 completed projects in Turkey. We carefully study each location, finishing material, the latest technological solutions and achievements of science to create a comfortable and safe space for guests, respond to the smallest comments and nuances for uncompromising quality and living happy moments of life of our valued customers. This premium project includes 3 15-storey bright apartment buildings with apartments of different layouts and areas with spacious terraces. All apartments are built with high quality materials and well planned. The complex has an impressive recreation area with 9 large swimming pools and a beautiful garden, spacious sunny areas with sun loungers, as well as a restaurant and a cozy bar. From here you can enjoy breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea. The perfect place to enjoy a cocktail or coffee. The complex also has a fitness center, spa and its own water park.

Unique solutions:

Panoramic swimming pools, with access to the pool from the first floor terraces.

Shuttle to the beach directly from the complex.

9 pools

Aquapark

Infrastructure and amenities :

● Outdoor pools with relaxation areas.

Indoor heated pool.

Fitness center: exercise machines, pilates.

● Sauna

Restaurant

Children’s playground

● Outdoor parking lots

Kitesurfing

Windsurfing

Cab service

Concierge service

● Management company

● Laundry services

In total more than 30 infrastructural elements, providing solutions for any issues arising during the stay in these apartments.

Near Girne and Nicosia, a new promising area with approved state programs for the construction of roads, promenade. Israeli medical center with a full range of services from routine specialist examinations to invasive interventions, cardiology, pediatric department, chemotherapy department and plastic surgery clinic with the latest advances in laser technology and telemedicine.

Complex infrastructure:

🔸 SPA

🔸 SAUNA AND HAMMAM SEPARATELY FOR MEN AND WOMEN

🔸 GYM

🔸 OUTDOOR POOL

🔸 CHILDREN’S POOL

🔸 KINDERGARTEN

🔸 CHILDREN’S SPORTS GROUNDS

🔸 OPEN PARKING UNDER EACH APARTMENT

🔸 TERRACES WITH ACCESS TO PRIVATE POOL FROM THE BALCONY

🔸 LAUNGE BAR

🔸 RESTAURANT

🔸 BARBECUE ZONE

🔸 ELECTRIC CAR CHARGERS

🔸 EVERY HOUR SHUTTLE TO THE BEACH

Apartment square footage and prices:

GROUND STUDIO with swimming pool:

NET 30 m2

BRUTTO 50 m2

55 000 GBP

1+1 Ground with swimming pool

NET 45 m2

65-70 m2

75 000 GBP

Studios 1 and 2 floors

NET 30 m2

50 m2

49 000 GBP

1+1 ground floor studios 1 and 2

NET 45 m2

65-70 m2

68 000 GBP

2+1

Net 90 m2

98 m2 GRUTTO

130,000 GBP

Payment Plan:

Reservation-2000 GBP

Down payment -35%

If you buy before 12.24 there is a unique offer — 60 months installment until 2029 (2 years after completion of construction!).
